data.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
data.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, guanciale, black pepper
data.process: Cook pasta, fry guanciale, mix eggs and cheese, toss with pasta

data.name: Chicken Alfredo
data.ingredients: Chicken breasts, fettuccine pasta, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic
data.process: Cook chicken, make sauce with cream, cheese, and garlic, toss with pasta

data.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
data.ingredients: Mixed vegetables, tofu, soy sauce, ginger, garlic
data.process: Stir-fry veggies and tofu, add sauce, serve over rice

data.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
data.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, olive oil
data.process: Roll out dough, add toppings, bake in a hot oven

data.name: Beef Tacos
data.ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, tomatoes
data.process: Cook beef with seasoning, assemble tacos

data.name: Cesar Salad
data.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
data.process: Toss ingredients with dressing, top with croutons

data.name: Mushroom Risotto
data.ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, onions, white wine, broth
data.process: Sauté onions and mushrooms, add rice and liquids, cook until creamy

data.name: Baked Salmon
data.ingredients: Salmon fillets, lemon, dill, butter
data.process: Season salmon, bake with lemon and dill

data.name: Pancakes
data.ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder
data.process: Mix ingredients, cook on a griddle

data.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
data.ingredients: Chicken, noodles, carrots, celery, broth
data.process: Boil chicken, add veggies and noodles, simmer

data.name: Beef Stroganoff
data.ingredients: Beef sirloin, mushrooms, onions, sour cream, paprika
data.process: Sauté beef and onions, add mushrooms, stir in sour cream and paprika

data.name: Greek Salad
data.ingredients: Cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, olive oil
data.process: Mix ingredients with olive oil dressing

data.name: Egg Fried Rice
data.ingredients: Rice, eggs, peas, carrots, soy sauce
data.process: Scramble eggs, add rice and veggies, stir in soy sauce

data.name: Sushi Rolls
data.ingredients: Sushi rice, seaweed, fish, vegetables, soy sauce
data.process: Roll ingredients in seaweed, slice into rolls

data.name: Lentil Soup
data.ingredients: Lentils, onions, carrots, celery, broth
data.process: Sauté veggies, add lentils and broth, simmer

data.name: Shrimp Scampi
data.ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, parsley
data.process: Sauté shrimp in garlic and butter, add lemon and parsley

data.name: Cauliflower Curry
data.ingredients: Cauliflower, chickpeas, tomatoes, curry spices, coconut milk
data.process: Cook cauliflower and chickpeas in curry sauce

data.name: Homemade Mac and Cheese
data.ingredients: Macaroni, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour
data.process: Make cheese sauce, mix with cooked macaroni

data.name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
data.ingredients: Tomatoes, basil, garlic, olive oil, baguette
data.process: Mix ingredients, serve on toasted bread

data.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
data.ingredients: Chicken breasts, spinach, feta cheese, garlic, herbs
data.process: Stuff chicken with spinach and feta, bake until done
